data.title: From Dusk Till Dawn
data.meta_description: Loaded with special effects and some of Hollywood’s best known special effects artists, From Dusk Till Dawn is a story of two fugitives that take a family hostage to get to the Mexican border. They stop for the night in an all-night bar only to find out the bar is a vampire’s nest, which another example of why you should never leave home without garlic. To survive, they must band together in this stylized action-horror flick. From Dusk Till Dawn is a collaboration between best friends, written by Quentin Tarantino (Django Unchained) and directed by Robert Rodriguez (Desperado) and stars George Clooney (Gravity), Harvey Keitel (Reservoir Dogs), and Juliette Lewis (A Million Little Pieces).
